data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: I find cycling very therapeutic. Cycling is one of my favorite activities. A couple of years ago, when I was still a university student, I often went cycling when I felt down or stressed. For me, cycling is a very relaxing and enjoyable activity. When I'm doing cycling, I'll forget all of the annoying troubles and difficulties I met in my life, instead, I will focus on the picturesque sceneries alongside the road. In addition, doing cycling enables me to build up my muscle and thus helps me keep fit. I also feel much more positive after doing this aerobic exercise because it can assist my body to release dopamine and thus let me feel pleasant. (116字)
data.referenceText: What kinds of activities do you find therapeutic and why?
data.referenceTranslate: 你发现什么样的活动具有治愈效果？为什么？
